title: Teacher Education Design for Dialogic Knowledge Building

context.prior_knowledge: Practical experience in vocational education settings and basic digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: A practical online learning environment designed to help in-service teachers apply dialogic knowledge-building strategies in actual lesson planning.

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more conversational learning scenarios in language education based on the DIANA model.
Learners can perform knowledge-sharing processes through actual case analyses with peer teachers using online collaboration tools.
Learners can develop and propose evaluation plans for two or more authentic problem-solving activities centered on learners in digital environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
